content: Simply put, <style=Highlight>ecological observation</style> means observing the creatures and plants on the planet. It helps us gain a better understanding of the environment we live in.
info: 生态调研-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: {A笑哈哈}As your planet grows, you'll come across all sorts of new wonders in life. Allow me to present you with the <style=Highlight>MomentFolio</style> app.
